about_the_game:
Once a glorious civilization, the Rune World was plunged into chaos by the "Core of Chaos" going berserk. As the last inheritor of the runes, you must survive the relentless tides of monsters that emerge with each passing day and night. Every battle is a new trial of runes—whether it’s extracting ancient runes from the bodies of colossal bosses or assembling the ultimate weapon capable of sealing the Chaos.

Game Features

  • Diverse Items: Choose from hundreds of unique runes and weapons, each with their own distinct traits.

  • Freeform Builds: The selection and arrangement of your runes will shape the form and attributes of your weapon’s output.

  • Treasure Chests & Shops: Elite monsters and bosses drop powerful chests, while shops serve as a vital source for runes.

  • Dynamic Events & Objectives: Encounter a variety of special events and objectives throughout the game, each offering rich rewards upon completion.

short_description: Combine hundreds of unique runes to craft your ultimate combat style. Strategically upgrade, select, and arrange your runes to unlock powerful buffs and synergies, perfecting your chain of attacks. With endless combinations, your playstyle is yours to define!
